Module com.github.sormuras.bach
Package com.github.sormuras.bach.api

Interface BachAPI

All Superinterfaces:
ExternalModuleAPI, JavaFormatterAPI, LogbookWriterAPI, ProjectBuildMainSpaceAPI, ProjectBuildTestSpaceAPI, ProjectComputerAPI, ToolProviderAPI
All Known Implementing Classes:
Bach
public interface BachAPI extends JavaFormatterAPI, ExternalModuleAPI, ProjectComputerAPI, ProjectBuildMainSpaceAPI, ProjectBuildTestSpaceAPI, ToolProviderAPI, LogbookWriterAPI
Defines the extensible API of the Java Shell Builder by combining overlay API declarations.
